Lyric:
[by:Lobster_Thermido]
[00:04:84] Mr. Sandman, bring me a dream
[00:10:57] Make her the cutest that I’ve ever seen
[00:15:48] Give her two lips like roses and clovers 
[00:20:64] And tell her that all her lonely nights are over
[00:25:68] Sandman, I’m so alone
[00:30:59] Don’t have nobody can call my own
[00:35:48] Please turn on your magic beam
[00:40:13] Mr. Sandman, bring me a dream
[00:47:71] Mr. Sandman, bring me a dream
[00:52:97] Make her the cutest that I’ve ever seen
[00:58:51] Give her the words that I’m a not rover
[01:03:36] And tell her that all her lonely nights are over
[01:07:79] Oh Sandman, I’m so alone
[01:14:01] Don’t have nobody to call my own
[01:19:59] So please turn on your magic beam
[01:24:38] Mr. Sandman, bring me a dream
[01:31:18] Oh Sandman, bring us a dream
[01:37:68] Make her the cutest that I’ve ever seen
[01:42:98] Give her two lips like roses and clovers
[01:47:59] And tell her that all her lonely nights are over
[01:52:92] Oh Sandman, I’m so alone
[01:57:86] Don’t have nobody to call my own
[02:02:28] So please turn on your magic beam
[02:07:01] Mr. Sandman, bring me a dream
